text: Jayantha Chandrasiri Jayasuriya PC is a Sri Lanka lawyer and politician. He is the 47th and current Chief Justice of Sri Lanka since 29 April 2019. Jayasuriya was approved by the Constitutional Council on the 26 April 2019 and sworn in three days later on the 29 April. He was the 45th Attorney General of Sri Lanka.Constitutional Council approves Jayantha as new Attorney General ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Sri Lankan lawyers Category:Chief justices of Sri Lanka
title: Jayantha Jayasuriya
